tool_description:
Make your onboarding process safer, faster, and smarter by verifying the legitimacy of the MSME merchants operating in the manufacturing or service sectors, on your platform.

With the Udyog Aadhaar verification API, you can now confidently onboard merchants knowing that the merchant exists, is genuine, and is authorized to partake in the manufacture or service sector by the Ministry of MSME.
name: Udyog Aadhaar Verification
title: Udyog Aadhaar Verification

api_list.name: Udyog Aadhaar Verification
api_list.description:
Make your onboarding process safer, faster, and smarter by verifying the legitimacy of the MSME merchants operating in the manufacturing or service sectors, on your platform.

With the Udyog Aadhaar verification API, you can now confidently onboard merchants knowing that the merchant exists, is genuine, and is authorized to partake in the manufacture or service sector by the Ministry of MSME.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://udyog-aadhaar-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/verify_with_source/udyog_aadhaar"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "udyog-aadhaar-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://udyog-aadhaar-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/verify_with_source/udyog_aadhaar"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "udyog-aadhaar-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
